titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, 31. 12. 1948
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original bei Timothy Moore; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Letters, S. 190; deutsch: Briefe, S. 228; Cambridge Letters, S. 333; WiC, S. 436).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Thanks for your letter & for having fulfilled both promises. My executors are Rhees & Burnaby of Trinity.
I wish you all good luck!
Rhees leaves me tomorrow. He sends his love & respects, & so does Drury. I can still work fairly well though not as I did a month ago.
